trans-unit.source: Passed to the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext)" /> method to enable the modification of a service contract and its context prior to generating code.
trans-unit.target: Se pasa al método <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext)" /> para habilitar la modificación de un contrato de servicio y su contexto antes de generar el código.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to modify the code document object model prior to the generation of code.
trans-unit.target: Utilice el objeto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> pasado al método <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para modificar el modelo de objetos de documento del código antes de la generación de código.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface is implemented on a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> implementation that is used to import custom WSDL elements or otherwise modify the code at the service or operation level.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, la interfaz <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> se implementa en una implementación <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> personalizada utilizada para importar los elementos WSDL personalizados o, de lo contrario, modificar el código en el nivel de servicio o de operación.

trans-unit.source: To modify the code at the operation level, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar el código en el nivel de la operación, vea <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to add code comments extracted from custom WSDL elements.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra el uso del objeto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> pasado al método <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para agregar comentarios de código extraídos de los elementos WSDL personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the resulting code comments.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra los comentarios de código resultantes.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The generator that generates the code for the contract.
trans-unit.target: Generador del código del contrato.

trans-unit.source: The contract description for the contract to be generated.
trans-unit.target: Descripción del contrato que se va a generar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the contract code to be generated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para el código de contrato que se genera.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> class using the specified contract generator, contract description, and contract code type declaration.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> mediante el generador de contrato, la descripción del mismo y la declaración de tipos de código del contrato especificados.

trans-unit.source: The generator that generates the code for the contract.
trans-unit.target: Generador del código del contrato.

trans-unit.source: The contract description for the contract to be generated.
trans-unit.target: Descripción del contrato que se va a generar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the contract code to be generated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para el código de contrato que se genera.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the duplex contract code to be generated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para el código de contrato dúplex que se va a generar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> class using the specified contract generator, contract description, and contract code type declaration.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext" /> mediante el generador de contrato, la descripción del mismo y la declaración de tipos de código del contrato especificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> para el contrato actual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> para el contrato actual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.Contract%2A> property to examine the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.Contract%2A> para examinar la <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=nameWithType> del contrato actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para el contrato actual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para el contrato actual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.ContractType%2A> property to examine or modify the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the current contract before the code is generated.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.ContractType%2A> para examinar o modificar <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=nameWithType> del contrato actual antes de generar el código.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to add code comments extracted from custom WSDL elements.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra el uso del objeto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext> pasado al método <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para agregar comentarios de código extraídos de los elementos WSDL personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the resulting code comments.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo de código siguiente muestra los comentarios de código resultantes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para el contrato de devolución de llamada dúplex del contrato del servicio.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration" /> para el contrato de devolución de llamada dúplex del contrato del servicio.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.DuplexCallbackType%2A> property to examine or modify the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract prior to generating code.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.DuplexCallbackType%2A> para examinar o modificar <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=nameWithType> para el contrato de devolución de llamada dúplex del contrato del servicio antes de generar el código.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> objects that represent the contract operations.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una colección de los objetos <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> que representan las operaciones del contrato.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> objects that represent the contract operations.
trans-unit.target: Colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext" /> que representan las operaciones del contrato.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.Operations%2A> property to examine or modify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> objects that represent the contract operations.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.Operations%2A> para examinar o modificar los objetos <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> que representan las operaciones del contrato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> that is to generate the contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> que generará el contrato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> that is to generate the contract.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator" /> que generará el contrato.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.ServiceContractGenerator%2A> property to examine or modify the code generator that is to create the contract code.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la propiedad <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext.ServiceContractGenerator%2A> para examinar o modificar el generador de código que creará el código de contrato.
